mapper.select: SELECT B.idx , M.menuname , B.title , B.writer , B.regdate , B.hit FROM board B, menus M WHERE B.menuid = M.menuid AND B.menuid = #{menuid}
SELECT idx , title , writer , regdate , hit FROM board WHERE title Like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
SELECT idx, title, content, writer, regdate, hit FROM board WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (menuid, title, content, writer) VALUES (#{menuid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
